q_ch: 2024年6月1日后的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks after June 1, 2024?
gt:
Sure! Here are the sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group Name | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status       |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| 32      | June 17, 2024       | July 14, 2024       | Premier Sewers     | 150            | 0                | In Progress  |
| 33      | July 17, 2024       | August 3, 2024      | Advanced Sewers    | 120            | 0                | In Progress  |
| 34      | July 10, 2024       | July 20, 2024       | Elite Sewers       | 330            | 330              | Completed    |

- **Status Legend**:
  - **0**: In Progress
  - **2**: Completed

Looks like the Elite Sewers have already completed their task! 🎉 If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.number AS planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.start_time > '2024-06-01';
steps.description: Retrieve sewing tasks that started after June 1, 2024, along with their details
